---
title: "Step 3: Select & Export Reporting Output"
---

In third step, the user will select the format in which they would like their aggregated reporting metrics to be provided: excel file [.xlsx], comma-separated values file [.csv], or a text document that contains plain text in the form of lines [.txt]. Once selected, the user will be able to download their output as specified.

It is important to note that this Data Management Plan describes the immediate and high priority reporting module needs (Steps 1-3 above). A list of revisions, additions, or improvements for future consideration are provided in the Future Work Section (**ADD LINK**)
